Description.value: This patch let this mod https://www.nexusmods.com/7daystodie/mods/569 work for A19 again. IMPORTANT: You need to remove 'ModInfo' open and close xml tags from original ModInfo.xml. IMPORTANT: You need to disable/delete original mod entityclasses.xml. Tip(linux): use this geany edit format command to prettify original xml files: xmlindent -i 2 -f
